r.d: This is a Rendering driver for Structures_DataGrid using Smarty. It adds the necessary variables and functions to a Smarty instance, in order to build a full-featured DataGrid within a Smarty template.
r.n: - Bug #9493: the selfPath option was not correctly propagated to the pager (thanks to pecus, pecus at pecus dot it) - Bug #9548: added support for per-column default sort directions (thanks to Anton, hire at ukr dot net) - this package is now licensed under the New BSD license
